Title: Relates to medical expenditure amounts
Summary: Relates to medical expenditure amounts and to county property tax levy reductions resulting from medical assistance program expenditure reductions.
LawCode: Amd Part C ยง1, Chap 58 of 2005; add ยง3-e, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 58 of the laws of 2005, authorizing reimbursements for expenditures made by or on behalf of social services districts for medical assistance for needy persons and the administration thereof, in relation to medical assistance expenditure amounts; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to county property tax levy reductions resulting from medical assistance program expenditure reductions
